title: Warriors on the Verge
description:
Jalen & Jacoby talk about Game 5 of the NBA Finals and how the Warriors won despite Steph Curry making exactly ZERO three point shots. With the Dubs just one win away from another championship, Jalen explains how the way the Celtics played defense on Curry allowed Andrew Wiggins to emerge and put up big numbers. ALSO – what is going on with Jayson Tatum down the stretch in this series? The guys take a deeper dive into his numbers to parse where it’s all going wrong for him. PLUS – “Fake Klay” was banned INDEFINITELY from the Chase Center after making his way into the arena for morning shoot around. Find out why Jalen says that was the WRONG decision.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
